channel.title: Shell on My Wiki
channel.description: Recent content in Shell on My Wiki

item.title: Shell Scripting
item.description: Introduction # Knowing how to use your shell and being able to write scripts that work across different Unix-like operating systems can be an incredibly important skill. I’ve often thought about it as an essential skill that a sysadmin should possess. However, there are various complications when it comes to using shell scripts. although bash is the most popular shell out there, it isn’t the standard shell used across all Unix-like systems
